archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.3.3c: c) alerting designated individuals to any failure in supporting information processing facilities (i.e. so that planned procedures can be followed to allow continued availability while the information processing facilities are repaired or replaced)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
